origenPadel.title: ORIGEN PADEL
origenPadel.subtitle: CLUB
origenPadel.description: Located in Paterna, Origen Padel Club is the home of JA Padel Academy. Our state-of-the-art facilities on Carrer Ciutat d'Ontinyent offer the perfect environment for you to develop your maximum potential in padel.

list.text: JA Padel Academy has completely transformed my game. The exclusive methodology and professional environment have helped me evolve both technically and mentally. It's incredible how they've managed to create a space where every mistake becomes learning.

I've been training at the academy for two years and the evolution has been spectacular. I started from scratch and now I can compete with confidence. The step-by-step methodology and team of trainers make every class a unique experience.

A first-class academy. If you're looking to improve your padel with a proven methodology, you'll find it here. The atmosphere is incredible, the trainers are exceptional and I always leave class having learned something new and having a great time.

An exceptional training experience! One of the best academies I've known. The trainers have a clear vision of your game and know exactly what to work on. The methodology is so effective that results are noticeable from the first session.

The best padel academy in Valencia. I'm delighted with the methodology and team of trainers. The combination of technique, tactics and mental development is perfect. The professional environment and personalized attention make every class an investment in your game.

The personalized treatment and academy methodology are spectacular. Professionally they have exceptional quality to identify and improve the technical aspects of each player. The dynamics are varied and always demand the best from yourself.

methodology.subtitle: FAIL AGAIN. FAIL BETTER.
methodology.title: EXCLUSIVE METHODOLOGY
methodology.description: We transform every error into a growth opportunity. Our unique methodology combines advanced technique, winning mindset, and personalized training to take you from failure to success. Every session is a step closer to your maximum potential.

testimonials.title: What those who have already lived the experience say

list.text: It was one of the highlights of my trip. Communication was quick and smooth, and the class was incredible, well-structured and very fun. The trainers were fantastic: professional, friendly and with very useful advice that improved my game.
list.name: Domen Kavzar

list.text: As an intermediate player I had a private class at the academy. It was a first-class lesson! One of the best I've had. The trainers had very good advice and a clear vision of what I should work on.
list.name: Mark Heimgartner

list.text: They were incredible classes! The trainers are experts at indicating the correct balls. They read your padel level very quickly and adapt their exercises. The explanations were clear and we executed at a high pace. The team is very friendly with a lot of humor.
list.name: An

hero.title: JA Padel Academy
hero.subtitle: Where the game is forged: history, methodology and the team that accompanies you.
hero.description: Where the game is forged: history, methodology and the team that accompanies you.

founder.name: Joan Aparici
founder.bio: Every player has unique potential waiting to be discovered. My vision is to create a space where error is not an obstacle, but the path to excellence. At JA Padel Academy, we transform every defeat into a lesson and every victory into a new starting point.
founder.quote: Padel is not just about winning points, it's about gaining perspective.

coaches.name: Joan Aparici
coaches.bio: Head Coach with proprietary methodology. Specialized in comprehensive player development.

coaches.name: Luis Gandasegui
coaches.bio: Senior Coach with 40+ years training professionals. Specialist in technique and tactics.

coaches.name: Jordi
coaches.bio: Coach expert in physical preparation and physiotherapy. Injury prevention specialist.

coaches.name: Jorge Guillem
coaches.bio: Specialist in competition and matchplay. Applies technique in real situations.

coaches.name: Jorge Domingo
coaches.bio: Specialist in technical analysis and gesture correction. Continuous improvement focus.

coaches.name: Manu
coaches.bio: Coach with experience at all levels. Specialist in technique and fundamentals.

methodology.title: JA Methodology

pillars.title: Technique
pillars.description: Efficient gestures, consistency and error control.

pillars.title: Tactics
pillars.description: Game patterns and decision making under pressure.

pillars.title: Mental
pillars.description: Routines, competitive focus and emotional management.

methodology.session: Typical session: specific warm-up â applied technique â tactical situations â directed matchplay â feedback + task plan.

questions.question: Do I need a minimum level?
questions.answer: No. We evaluate your starting point and design your personal plan.

questions.question: Group size?
questions.answer: We work in small groups (4-6) or in individual format.

questions.question: Do you do video analysis?
questions.answer: Yes. We offer sessions with technical report and improvement plan.

questions.question: Where are you located?
questions.answer: At Origen Padel, Valencia. Easy access and parking.

questions.question: Can I try a class?
questions.answer: Yes. Schedule an assessment class to define objectives.

questions.question: Do you work with seniors/children?
questions.answer: Yes. We adapt methodology to each stage and objective.

cta.title: Do you want to know more about our academy?
cta.description: Discover our methodology and the team that will take you to the next level

hero.title: Cookie
hero.description: Transparent information about cookie usage at JA Padel Academy

intro.title: What are cookies?
intro.description1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. These cookies help us improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.
intro.description2: At JA Padel Academy, we use cookies responsibly and transparently, always respecting your privacy and complying with current regulations (GDPR, LOPD).

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the website and cannot be disabled.
essential.item1: Session cookies to keep your session active
essential.item2: Security cookies to protect against attacks

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: They help us understand how you interact with our site to improve and optimize the experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: To show you personalized content and relevant offers about our services.

website.title: On our website
website.description: You can configure your cookie preferences at any time using the cookie banner that appears at the bottom of the page.
website.tipText: If you have already accepted cookies, you can change your preferences by clicking "Configure Preferences" in the cookie banner.

browser.title: In your browser
browser.description: You can also manage cookies directly from your browser settings:

chrome.title: Google Chrome
chrome.path: Settings â Privacy and security â Cookies and site data

firefox.title: Mozilla Firefox
firefox.path: Options â Privacy and security â Cookies and site data

safari.title: Safari
safari.path: Preferences â Privacy â Cookies and website data

edge.title: Microsoft Edge
edge.path: Settings â Cookies and site permissions â Cookies and stored data

session.title: Session cookies:
session.description: They are deleted when you close the browser

persistent.title: Persistent cookies:
persistent.description: They remain for up to 365 days or until you delete them

consent.title: Consent cookies:
consent.description: They are maintained until you change your preferences

contact.title: Do you have questions about our cookies?
contact.description: If you have any doubts about our cookie policy or want to exercise your rights, don't hesitate to contact us.

hero.title: Privacy
hero.description: Responsible protection and processing of your personal data

intro.title: General Information
intro.description: At JA Padel Academy, we are committed to protecting your privacy and processing your personal data responsibly and transparently, complying with current regulations (GDPR, LOPD-GDD).

legal.title: Legal compliance
legal.description: Comply with tax and accounting obligations

security.title: Security
security.description: Protect against fraud and ensure security

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: For sending commercial communications and using non-essential cookies.

contractual.title: Contractual execution
contractual.description: For providing training services and managing bookings.

legitimate.title: Legitimate interest
legitimate.description: For improving our services and analyzing website usage.

obligation.title: Legal obligation
obligation.description: For complying with tax and accounting obligations.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.description: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, limit, port and object to the processing of your personal data.

access.title: Access
access.description: Know what data we have about you

limitation.title: Limitation
limitation.description: Restrict the processing of your data

portability.title: Portability
portability.description: Receive your data in structured format

opposition.title: Opposition
opposition.description: Object to the processing of your data

active.title: Active customer data:
active.description: While you maintain a commercial relationship with us

security.title: Security measures
security.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:

access.title: Restricted access
access.description: Only authorized personnel access the data

contact.title: Exercise your rights
